successes.title: Ubi - The Ubiquitous Computer - Voice-Activated & Always On
successes.description: The Ubi is an always-on voice-activated computer ready to help. Just plug it in, talk to it and it'll help you connect with your world.

Pledges.description: Pledge $1 and get access to backer-only updates and early order access once the Ubi becomes available on the market.

EARLY BETA BACKERS - For your early support, you get a tremendous deal on the Ubi. You'll get one Ubi and bragging rights of how you were one of the first to get one. FREE SHIPPING within the US or Canada, add $10 for everywhere else. Thanks for your early support!
SINGLE UBI - This gets you started. You'll get one Ubi. Put it in the room that you use the most in your home or office. FREE SHIPPING within the US or Canada, add $10 for everywhere else.
TWO UBIs - You'll get two Ubis that you can put in your two most used rooms in your home or office. FREE SHIPPING within the US or Canada, add $10 for everywhere else.
UBI 3 PACK - Three Ubis for your three most used rooms. FREE SHIPPING within the US or Canada, add $12 for everywhere else.
UBI 5 PACK - This is perfect for making your entire home intelligent. FREE SHIPPING within the US or Canada, add $17 for everywhere else.

THE INNER SANCTUM - With this reward, you'll get 10 Ubis, have first crack at the SDK before it's generally released, and get a 20 minute Skype call with us before the first delivery of the Ubi to discuss app development, partnering, or whatever your heart desires. FREE SHIPPING within the US or Canada, add $34 everywhere else.
